title: JINX NEEDS NEW SKINS!!!
body: I'm a {{champion:222}} Jinx main, and playing her without a skin is awful. She only has two skins available, and having been out for nearly three years, that's just rubbish. Bringing back slayer Jinx would be amazing,{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  but they haven't, and when I see all the {{champion:17}} Teemo mains with six skins or whatever, I just wanna FIRE BULLETS THROUGH HIS FUZZY LITTLE MUSHROOM-RIDDEN FACE!!! AARGH!

replies.body:
No. 

She has enough considering how long she has been released for.
But he flipping blinds me. So u can shoot all u want, but it'll just miss.
I thought I implied that with the obvious sarcasm.

While they have made 3 ezreal skins in 1 year hahaha, seems like they have no creativity they give old champions skins and not worry about new ones because they are "Hard" to make skins for even tho there are 1000000 bloody lovely people in this community make for these new champions it's sad...

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey Max,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=431dbprY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-10T07:45:54.362+0000)
>
> So vote...

I've got both skins i don't play her at all so I'm going to say more! to imply MORE! skins for the champions who had enough time out to get more then 1 or 2 skins (Jhin, Aurelion mainly) Like cmon arcade aurelion sounds way better then arcade ezreal and they now have 3 adcs on arcade skin line....
Wait. Jinx is amazing without a skin is what you meant right.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
She has a pretty cool default skin, but it makes me feel scrub playing a main without a skin.
Haha, I have firecracker and slayer. I only got slayer cause it was on my personal shop a couple months ago for 700 RP :D
Not fair! I like slayer Jinx but her other skins aren't great, although firecracker jinx is OK
